document.full_text: japan's mizuho financial group  said on monday its president, takashi tsukamoto, would step down and be replaced by the head of its corporate banking unit, yasuhiro sato.
document.title: mizuho president tsukamoto to step down after atm problem
lines_and_colors: japan's mizuho financial group  said on monday its president, takashi tsukamoto, would step down and be replaced by the head of its corporate banking unit, yasuhiro sato.
